name: Dinari SRLN
description: The Dinari dShare token for SPDR Blackstone Senior Loan ETF (SRLN.d) is a 1:1 backed token representing shares of SPDR Blackstone Senior Loan ETF. SRLN.d allows users to gain exposure to SPDR Blackstone Senior Loan ETF's equity in a tokenized form, leveraging the benefits of blockchain technology. Each SRLN.d token is fully backed by a corresponding share of SPDR Blackstone Senior Loan ETF, securely held in a transparent treasury vault. This tokenized version of SPDR Blackstone Senior Loan ETF offers enhanced transferability, instant settlement, 24/7 trading, and fractional ownership, making it more accessible and liquid for a wider range of investors.
